_header: Through sweetness of lore in preaching
_description: How pastors should care for souls — three monorhyming lines translating ‘Per dulcedinem doctrine in predicando’ which precedes them in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Þoru suetnesse of lore in prechingÞoru fair conuersacioun
                    in leuingÞoru ȝefte of elmesse in fynding
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 15.
